attributes.action: An immediate investigation into the aftermath support of air crash victims.
attributes.additional_details: Montreal commission was set up and worldwide adhered and air operators insurance to fly. Due to an American airline crash that survivors was found walking around lost on the run way in total shock from an airplane crash and the Montreal Commission enforced that aircraft owners to financially support their full recovery until court settlement...
attributes.background: We call for an immediate investigation into the aftermath support of air crash victims, family's, and survivors by the air craft owners and share owners of the operators the oil companies. Investigate the hardship, financial turmoil, debt, stress, anxiety, what current legal process allows this.

rejection.details: If you could start a petition with a clearer request for action from the UK Government or Parliament, we could look at this again.
